SSH¶

You may SSH to a server either using keyed-access, or directly from the Bcome shell.

Using keyed-access¶

> bcome inventory:server:ssh

From the shell¶

from an inventory namespace¶

> bcome inventory
> ssh servername

from a server namespace¶

> bcome inventory
> cd servername
> ssh

See how easy it is¶
